attributes.action: Peoples Vote on London Mayor, popular opinion has changed on the post holder
attributes.background: The current Mayor of London has failed to deal with the escalation of knife crime and increased murder rate during his time in office. More effort has been put into campaigning against Brexit than the actual job he was elected to. Public opinion has changed and a people's vote is needed as a result

rejection.details:
We're not sure whether you'd like to change the length of term for the London Mayor or change the law so that the Government can decide the date of the mayoral elections. At the moment, the next London mayoral election will be held in May 2020.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
